dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.
dependent_to.name: py-aiohttp

dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.
dependent_to.name: py-asdf

dependent_to.description: Self-service finite-state machines for the programmer on the go.
dependent_to.name: py-automat

dependent_to.description: An open source Python library for structuring and unstructuring data.
dependent_to.name: py-cattrs

dependent_to.description:
Python interface to map GRIB files to the NetCDF Common Data Model
following the CF Convention using ecCodes.
dependent_to.name: py-cfgrib

dependent_to.description: Python Serverless Microframework for AWS.
dependent_to.name: py-chalice

dependent_to.description: Parse CMake files with Python.
dependent_to.name: py-cmake-parser

dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.
dependent_to.name: py-datacube

dependent_to.description: Python interface to the ecCodes GRIB and BUFR decoder/encoder.
dependent_to.name: py-eccodes

dependent_to.description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.
dependent_to.name: py-fiona

dependent_to.description: A library for property based testing.
dependent_to.name: py-hypothesis

dependent_to.description: Library with helpers for the jsonlines file format
dependent_to.name: py-jsonlines

dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependent_to.description: Code generator and generated types for Language Server Protocol.

dependent_to.description:
Markdown parser, done right. 100% CommonMark support, extensions, syntax

dependent_to.name: py-markdown-it-py

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows

dependent_to.description: Core utilities for Python packages.
dependent_to.name: py-packaging

dependent_to.description:
Particle provides a pythonic interface to the Particle Data Group (PDG)
particle data tables and particle identification codes, with extended
particle information and extra goodies.
dependent_to.name: py-particle

dependent_to.description: Library for communicating with the GA4GH Task Execution API.
dependent_to.name: py-py-tes

dependent_to.description: Parser for 'pyproject.toml'

dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.description: Meta-package containing dependencies for testing.

dependent_to.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-rasterio

dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-ray

dependent_to.description: JSON Referencing + Python.
dependent_to.name: py-referencing

dependent_to.description:
A persistent HTTP cache that provides an easy way to get better
performance with the python requests library.
dependent_to.name: py-requests-cache

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description: Sphinx objects.inv Inspection/Manipulation Tool.

dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets

dependent_to.name: py-twisted

dependent_to.description: scalable pythonic model fitting for high energy physics

The tskit library provides the underlying functionality used to load,
examine, and manipulate tree sequences
dependent_to.name: tskit
